message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $105. How about we compromise at $112?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $112 and $108. How about we try $110 again?
I'm still not convinced that $110 is the best price for this product. Can you consider $106?
I'm not willing to go as low as $106. How about we try $109?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. Can you meet me at $107?
